feature.label: ECF Discovery SLP (RFC 2608) Provider
feature.description: This feature provides the ECF Discovery Service Location Protocol (RFC 2608) Provider. This provider can be used by OSGi Remote Services Discovery to publish and discover OSGi RS EndpointDescriptions.
